content:
Dear Archis Academy Team,

We at Concreate appreciate the opportunity to work with Archis Academy as a potential reseller or sales partner. Our cutting-edge digital production studio excels in creating 3D assets and virtual environments for various applications such as architectural visualization, digital twin, gaming, metaverses, product visualization, advertising, educational training, virtual and augmented reality experiences.

As per our discussion, we are pleased to offer you a reseller agreement with Concreate. Under this agreement, Archis Academy would sell our digital assets and virtual environments to your clients and provide support for their implementation. We would like to propose a revenue-sharing model of 30% for Archis Academy for each project we execute together.

Our team of talented designers and animators utilize state-of-the-art technology to craft visually captivating and interactive digital assets that cater to the needs of our clients. With the combined experience and expertise of Concreate and Archis Academy, we can offer exceptional digital solutions to your clients and increase both of our revenues.

We believe that this partnership can be mutually beneficial for both of our companies, and we look forward to the opportunity to work with Archis Academy. Please let us know if you have any questions or concerns, and we will be happy to discuss further.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]
Concreate Team
